extendedInfo.description: Numbers at Home lite is an ad free , fun educational game for your kids between the ages of 2 and 5.  With the help of Beto (our main character) and the different games inside Chamo Numbers at Home lite, your children will have fun while learning to count.â This app is optimized for both phones and tablets âFEATURES:â 2 different games to teach kids counting with two different level each.â Bilingual English and Spanish, texts and voices.â Beto is always there to help the kids complete the task with hints and positive messages.â Stickers rewards after level completion.â Hidden animations in each game are there to discover.â Helps kids learn the shapes and sounds of the numbers.â GAME 1: Bring the numbers home âThe objective of this game is to select the numbers in the ascendant order from 1 to 20.Easy: The kid must touch the green arrow to move to the next number.Hard: The kid is presented with two choices and he must select the correct one to advance to the next number.â GAME 2: Letâs find the number âThe objective of this game is to identify the numbers that appear in the canvas and find them in the window behind.Easy: The numbers appear on the canvas so the kid can visually identify the number.Hard: An interrogation sign appears in the canvas and the kid must find the number based only on the voice.This is a free with no ads, no links to external sites and no in-app purchases. A real Free game.â Let's get in touch! âBecome a fan of Chamo Games on Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/chamogamesFollow us on Twitter @chamogamesVisit our sitehttp://www.chamogames.comDrop us your concerns and recommendations viasupport@chamogames.comPlease be kind and remember this is a beta version of our first game so there might be some mini tiny bugs here and there. If you have any questions contact us at support@chamogames.comPRIVACY POLICY:We donât collect any personal or location data information. We simply collect anonymous game usage data to improve our games.KW: Chamo Games, Numbers, Learn Numbers, Learning Numbers, Educational, Numbers for Kids, Count, Learn to Count, Educational Games, Numbers at Home, Games for Kids, Count for Kids, Learn the Numbers, Children Games, Children, Preschool Games, Preschool, Beto, Games for Children, Child Games, Child Numbers

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Sencillo y simple, muy bueno para ni\303\261os peque\303\261os. Recomendaria animaciones con un factor de azar q les de mas dinamismo. Igualmente movimientos menos lineales.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Whoever did that voice is phenomenal!!!! My kids can\'t hear enough of her!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Learning like a boss!
reviews.comment: I wish this had existed when i was a kid! It\' very fun and you can really learn the numbers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need the FULL VERSION
reviews.comment: It\'s such a great app but the lite version is too limited and there is no full version. Kids love to learn numbers from this but it only has 1 to 20. It should have up to 100 and a few more games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good Not Bad
reviews.comment: Not really what I expected. All u do is press on an arrow to see numbers on a wagon.
reviews.author: grace Washington
